# owningView

**Instance Property**

The view that owns this layout guide.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var owningView: UIView? { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this property is `nil`. To participate in Auto Layout, the layout guide must be added to a view by calling its [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/addLayoutGuide(_:)] method. Do not modify this property directly. Instead, use the view’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/addLayoutGuide(_:)] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/removeLayoutGuide(_:)] methods, which update this property as necessary.

## Working with layout guides

- **identifier**: A string used to identify the layout guide.
- **layoutFrame**: The layout guide’s frame in its owning view’s coordinate system.
